code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{TrendingUp,TrendingDown}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatCard=_ref=>{let{title,value,previousValue,icon:Icon,index=0}=_ref;const growth=previousValue?(value-previousValue)/previousValue*100:0;const isPositive=growth>=0;const formatValue=val=>{if(typeof val==='number'&&val>=1000){return"R$ ".concat((val/1000).toFixed(1),"k");}return typeof val==='number'&&title.includes('R$')?"R$ ".concat(val.toLocaleString()):val.toLocaleString();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"bg-white rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-sm border border-gray-200 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-300",initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{delay:index*0.1,duration:0.5},whileHover:{scale:1.02},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-3 bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-500 to-purple-600 rounded-xl",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"w-6 h-6 text-white"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-1 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium ".concat(isPositive?'bg-green-100 text-green-700':'bg-red-100 text-red-700'),children:[isPositive?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrendingUp,{className:"w-4 h-4"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrendingDown,{className:"w-4 h-4"}),Math.abs(growth).toFixed(1),"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-gray-600 text-sm font-medium mb-1",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:formatValue(value)})]})]});};export default StatCard;
